rows.name: Please buy this too, mo!
I'm on patrol today!
Right, right...

Heeey!
Pull me up!
Plenty of materials, mo...
Does it look fixable?
...There aren't enough materials.
Another peaceful day in Torigo...
I wish Father would come home soon...

I want to get my Blade some good Core
Chips...
What a lovely landscape painting, mo...
That fish looks delicious!
It's a whopper of a catch!
How much for these vegetables?
Do you use the windmill to grind the flour?
That's right!
Where do these kids get all their energy...?
This is a great playground.
This last order was pretty hefty.
Well, I like to keep busy.

It's cold!
I'll get you for that!
Ahhh! So cold!
I wonder what's beyond the horizon...

I hear there are hot places,
and cold places, too.
Think we can catch anything here?

I think you'd have better luck fishing
in Coolley Lake, outside Torigo.
Want to go to the docks?
I'd love to go look at some new makeup.
That Edvald sure likes fishing, huh?
That looks like a good spot for salvaging, mo.

It looks awfully deep, mo...
You go first, mo.

Oh!
That fish just flashed!

If I bring it home, do you think
my ma will be happy?
Just look at that waterwheel!

Using the power of falling water...
Clever.
It's a real earworm, mo...
Eeek!

Ooh!
How enchanting!

Things have been noisy over at
the Torigoth Base lately.
I wonder what happened.

What is it?!
Go away, mo!

There's some kind of commotion
over at that pier.
I might go check it out later.
Is this the last of the luggage?
Yeah, that should be everything.
Are you taking this ship?
That's right.
Watch out!

It's fiiine.
Don't worry about it.

News just in from the Avaritia ship, mo!
Perfect for all you rumor-loving Gulans, mo!

I should get my family a souvenir.
But what...?
Hey, pass me that drink, would you?
Roger that.
Thanks for sharing the other day!
Don't mention it.
Let's try sneaking into the base again!

No way... We got an earful the
last time they caught us...
That Gulan kid is always over there.
Do you think she's trying to make friends?

So many flowers
I've never seen before!

You don't know how to climb trees?
Let me teach you!
I don't know if I can...
Let's go see the Armu!
But the big ones are scary!
What's this building?

It's the Consulate.
Some important people work there.
Ah, what a nice view...
Shall we go to the shopping district later?

Sounds good.
Let's go for a drink!
What an enormous windmill.
Yeah, you get a great view of it from here.

Are you going to be a soldier
when you grow up?
I'd rather just move cargo.

That thing feels out of place
in this tranquil landscape.

I suppose, but...
what can you do?

I think I'll get some
meat from the base today.

Ahoy there!
Need a hand?
Ugh, gotta get home and start dinner...
Come on, let's play together!

After we take this little guy
back to the farm.
One! Two! Three! Four!
Outdated equipment again?

Stop your whining.
We're at the butt-end of the Empire,
what do you expect?
Is this all the cargo for transport?
There's a bit more still on the way.
The forest seems lively today.

You mean Gula, the Divine Beast, is lively.
Don't you?

Right... Come to think of it,
this is all part of the Divine Beast...

Here to buy lumber, mo!
And selling everyday goods in return, mo!
The price of wood has gotten so low recently.

Using quality wood from Gula
to reinforce Goldmund...
Oh, be still my beating heart, mo!
Ughhh...

...Ugh, I knew I shouldn't have
drunk so much last night...
Do you write home often?

It's been a while...
Maybe I should.

I hear they're researching power-ups for us
back in the fatherland!
Let's hope that pays off.
I won't lose to any soldier!
...You know we're on a break, right?

There's no way I could work
that high up...

How did you even make it here on the
Divine Beast Battleship?

Stop, mo! Don't hurt me, mo!
I just came to deliver a package, mo!
You make the same mistake every time, mo!!
Time for a breather...

Hey, I want to ride number eight.
Move those plates!
What's that guy talking about?

Beats me...
Can't hear a thing.
We haven't had many casualties lately...

Man, I just can't get enough of that
look of disdain Meleph-sama gives you.
...Hey, are you all right?
Could you grab those vegetables for me?

I'm just watching
the birds fly by.

That windmill never ceases
to amaze me.
Right, about our next shipping route...
As a rule, here's what you do...

We must be able to adapt
to any and all circumstances.

A farm, right next to the base?
Unbelievable.
Peace has made these people soft.

What do you think of this view?
Pretty great, huh?
There are so many of them...
Is it some kind of food?
I don't know what we're supposed to do now...
Why can't we leave?!

I'm sorry...
My orders are not to let anyone pass.
Please try to be quick.
Brrrrrrrr...
Let us out of here, mo...

The info broker's got a rumor about a
Divine Beast being launched, mo! I'm so curious, mo!
